user_query: How can I maintain the shape of my clothing?
agent_response:
To keep your clothes looking fabulous, here are some tips to maintain their shape:

1. 🔄 Rotate Your Wardrobe: Mix it up by wearing clothes alternately, giving them a chance to breathe. After each wear, hang them in a well-ventilated space to keep them fresh. 🌬️
2. 👜 Keep It Light: Only carry the essentials in your pockets to avoid any garment distortion. ✨
3. 🧼 Stay Clean: Gently use a soft brush or lint roller to remove any debris before washing—your clothes will thank you! 🙌
4. 👔 Suits Deserve the Best: Never throw your suits in the washer. For the best results, take them to a pro cleaner to keep them in pristine condition. 🧑‍🔬
